itemData.name: Tome of Cold Weather Flight
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Tome of Cold Weather Flight
Binds to account
Requires level 1 to 80 (80)
Requires Riding (225)
Use: Teaches you Cold Weather Flying, allowing you to fly in Northrend. This tome is consumed when read.
1 Charge
